suggest.meta_keywords: Amazon S3, Azion Data Stream, AWS IAM, data streaming setup, S3 bucket configuration, Real-Time Manager, Amazon S3 integration, Data Stream configuration, AWS region setup, S3 data endpoint, Access Key management
suggest.meta_description: Learn how to configure Amazon S3 as an endpoint to efficiently receive data from Azion Data Stream, including setup of IAM credentials, S3 buckets, and key management.

current.meta_description: Hands-on to configure Amazon S3 to receive data from Data Stream.
